Name: Thunderbolt
About the game: A stylish puzzle game where you play the role of something flying through the long corridors. The main task is to shoot down objects thereby collecting fuel, which very quickly ends. To avoid collisions with other figures and go to the coveted finish. It's time to test your reaction skills. - 10 stylish levels. - 10 wonderful musical compositions. - Controls with mouse clicks.
